data.eml:eml: † Japanolaccophilus beatificus sp. n. from Baltic amber and a key to the Laccophilinae genera of the World (Coleoptera: Laccophilinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Balke, Michael, Hendrich, Lars (2019): † Japanolaccophilus beatificus sp. n. from Baltic amber and a key to the Laccophilinae genera of the World (Coleoptera: Laccophilinae). Zootaxa 4567 (1): 176-182, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4567.1.10
